extensionDescription.message: Quickly append selected text to Notion pages

saveDialogTagsPlaceholder.message: Enter tags, press Enter to add, or select from dropdown

errorNetwork.message: Unknown error, please check network connection

errorNotConfigured.message: Please configure Notion API token and database ID in extension settings first

setupStep1.message: Visit Notion integrations page to create a new integration

setupStep2.message: Copy the generated API token below

setupStep3.message: Create or select a database in Notion as collection target

setupStep4.message: Click "Share" on the target database, invite your integration and grant edit permissions

setupStep5.message: Copy the database ID below (32-character string from URL)

setupStep6.message: After saving configuration, the extension can select existing pages or create new pages in the database

helpApiToken.message: Get API token from Notion integrations page

helpPageId.message: Get from Notion page URL, format: https://notion.so/page-title-32-character-id

helpDatabaseId.message: Get from Notion database URL, format: https://www.notion.so/32-character-database-id

confirmClearTags.message: Are you sure you want to clear all tag history? This action cannot be undone.

confirmDeleteTag.message: Are you sure you want to delete tag "$TAG$"?

configureFirst.message: Please configure Notion API token and Database ID first

createPageDialogDesc.message: Enter the page name, Phoebe will help you create it in Notion ‚ú®

pageNameExists.message: Page with this name already exists, please use a different name

extensionNotInitializedRetry.message: Extension not initialized, please refresh the page and try again

pleaseFillApiAndDatabase.message: Please fill in API token and Database ID

configSaveSuccess.message: Configuration saved and verified! Target database: $DATABASE$

configSaveSuccessPage.message: Configuration saved and verified! Target page: $PAGE$

configSaveSuccessDatabase.message: Configuration saved and verified! Target database: $DATABASE$

setupStepMode.message: Choose usage mode: Page mode (direct append) or Database mode (select or create pages)

setupStepShare.message: Share your target page or database with your integration and grant edit permissions

setupStepComplete.message: Setup complete! You can now start using the extension

modePageDesc.message: Content is appended directly to the selected page, suitable for simple content collection

modeDatabaseDesc.message: Choose existing pages or create new ones when saving, suitable for structured content management

helpTargetPage.message: Select the page to append content to

helpTargetDatabase.message: Select the database to save content to

loadResourcesFailed.message: Failed to load, please check your API key

contentWillAppend.message: Content will be appended to the end of this page

shortcutSettingsDesc.message: Configure keyboard shortcuts for quick note feature

shortcutInstructions.message: The quick note feature requires setting up a keyboard shortcut first. Click the button below to access Chrome's shortcut settings page.

pageModeRequiresTargetPage.message: Page mode requires configuring a target page in settings first

databaseModeRequiresTargetDatabase.message: Database mode requires configuring a target database in settings first

pageModeNeedsConfig.message: Page mode requires target page configuration

databaseModeNeedsConfig.message: Database mode requires target database configuration

saveDialogAlreadyOpen.message: Save dialog is already open, please close it first

quickNoteDialogAlreadyOpen.message: Quick note dialog is already open, please close it first

dialogAlreadyOpen.message: A dialog is already open, please close it first

quickNoteDisabled.message: Quick note feature degraded: Another dialog is in use

quickNoteDisabledSaveOpen.message: Quick note feature degraded: Save dialog is in use

quickNoteBlockedBySave.message: Cannot open quick note: Save dialog is in use

saveBlockedByQuickNote.message: Cannot open save dialog: Quick note is in use

dialogConflict.message: Cannot open: Another dialog is in use

globalDialogBlock.message: Phoebe is busy: $1 is active in another tab

clickToJump.message: Click the link below to jump to the active tab:
